title: Aditya Birla Finance and AU Small Finance Bank partner to launch a co-branded credit card
description: The banking regulator earlier in the year said that branding partners for credit cards cannot access customer data or engage in any transaction after the card is initially issued. The RBI rule is focused on increased scrutiny especially on the partnerships between banks and fintechs firms.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
